pages.text: Charge is a type of point-type spell form, with no collision of its own, and the target of the spell is the target acquired by the previous form.$(br)$(t:Raising these values of the form can increase the profit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Growth Needs：$(/t)$(t:Increasing the Force of the form can increase the profit)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force$(/t)$()$(t:Increasing the Range of the form can increase the profit)$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Duration$(/t)$()$(br)$(t:Effect of Spell Attributes on Functional Spells)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Magical Efficacy：$(/t)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Increases with charge time$()$(li2)$(#EE6363)Increases with charge time$()$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Increases with charge time$()$(br2)

In its default state, Charging inherits the Magical Efficacy of the previous spell form, and as the duration and force of the spell increases, it increases its own Magical Efficacy. $(br2)When the force and duration of the spell are high enough, it can increase the Magical Efficacy to 3-4 times or more.
